name: Michael Ferriter
description: Well, I pride myself in being compassionate, aware, evolved (or at least evolving), articulate and considerate. I look for the best in people, accept that we all have our flaws and I try to learn from my mistakes. I’m an optimist who’s been around the block and still believes that nice guys finish best.I appreciate good humor, sensibility,and a well-turned phrase. And great music, incisive writing, fine art and provocative film. I value honesty, openness, understanding and tolerance.
